comprehensive_overview: StringTie is a software for transcript assembly and quantification of RNA-Seq data. It is designed to efficiently assemble and quantify full-length transcripts representing multiple splice variants for each gene locus.
core_features: Some core features of StringTie include de novo transcriptome assembly, discovery of novel transcripts, estimation of transcript abundances, identification of differentially expressed genes, compatibility with diverse RNA-Seq library preparation protocols, and ability to handle single-end and paired-end reads.
